sense.gloss: small dish (usu. one of several accompanying rice), side dish
jack-off material, something to masturbate to

sdata.j: ↑今晩↑↓こんばん↓の|おかず|はもう↑決↑↓き↓めてあります。
sdata.e: I've decided what to cook for dinner.

sdata.j: ↑今晩↑↓こんばん↓の|おかず|は↑魚↑↓さかな↓だ。
お↑昼↑↓ひる↓はお↑母↑↓かあ↓さんいないから、↑冷蔵庫↑↓れいぞうこ↓にあるご↑飯↑↓はん↓と|おかず|をレンジでチンして↑食↑↓た↓べてね。
sdata.e: Mum isn't going to be home for lunch, so you should microwave some rice and side dishes from the fridge.

sdata.j: え、たこ↑焼↑↓や↓きを|おかず|にするの？
sdata.e: What, you decided to have takoyaki as one of your main food ideas?

sdata.j: え、たこ↑焼↑↓や↓きを|おかず|にするの？
sdata.e: What, you decided to have takoyaki as one of your main set meal items?
